item.description:
** FREE ADVANCED SCREENING - THE HIP HOP PROJECT **

"If you had the whole world listening, what would you have to say?"


TUESDAY, MAY 1ST @ 7PM
AMC Lowes Boston Common Theater


** Q&A with filmmaker Matt Ruskin and star Christopher "Kazi" Rolle directly following the screening **


Email advanced.screening@gmail.com with the subject line "Hip Hop Project" for your free passes


Synopsis:

Award-winning documentary: From Executive Producers Bruce Willis and Queen Latifah, THE HIP HOP PROJECT is the compelling story of Kazi, a formerly homeless teenager who inspires a group of New York City teens to transform their life stories into powerful works of art, using hip hop as a vehicle for self-development and personal discovery. In contrast to all the negative attention focused on hip hop, this is a story of hope, healing and the realization of dreams.

The Hip Hop Project Film Site
item.name: FREE ADVANCED SCREENING - THE HIP HOP PROJECT
